verbose_text: As shown in Scheme XREF_FIG, both DS-g-MTX and Dex-g-MTX were synthesized by condensation reaction with 1-ethyl-(3-(dimethylamino) propyl) carbodiimide hydrochloride (EDC.HCl) as a condensing agent and 4-N, N-dimethylaminopyridine (DMAP) as a catalyst.
evidence: DS-g-MTX and Dex-g-MTX were synthesized by condensation reaction with 1-ethyl-(3-(dimethylamino)propyl) carbodiimide hydrochloride
